name: MeatBrawl
description:
MeatBrawl

Eat, Meat, Brawl, Repeat !

MeatBrawl is a 2D pixel style platformer game, with brawler elements. The dungeons are procedurally generated, leading up to unique, challenging bosses. Enter the brawl and save as many villagers as you can, collect meat and invest in your village. Upgrade the tanning salon, the weapons shop, the hairdresser parlour and the clothes shop to unlock more powerful weapons and be the most fashionable cavemen in town !
